    D

    decodeFile(List<String>) - Method in class ie.atu.sw.Decoder
    takes a list of lines from an encoded file and decodes them all each line has space separated codes uses decodeLine for each line
    decodeLine(List<Integer>) - Method in class ie.atu.sw.Decoder
    this method takes a list of numbers and tries to turn them into words if a number isn't in the map we just throw in [???] instead
    Decoder - Class in ie.atu.sw
    decoder takes in a list of numbers and turns them back into words or suffixes this is the reverse of what encoder does we use the decoding map to look everything up Big-O: O(n) for decodeLine where n is amount of codes in a line
    Decoder(Map<Integer, String>) - Constructor for class ie.atu.sw.Decoder
    sets the decoding map we gonna use to turn codes into words good for decodeLine and decodeFile
    description() - Method in enum class ie.atu.sw.ConsoleColour
    Gets the description of the color or text style.

    E

    encodeFile(List<String>) - Method in class ie.atu.sw.Encoder
    takes a list of lines and encodes all of them joins the numbers as strings per line so they can be saved
    encodeLine(String) - Method in class ie.atu.sw.Encoder
    encodes one line of text to a list of integers
    Encoder - Class in ie.atu.sw
    encoder takes lines of normal text and turns them into numbers it looks up words in the map and builds a list of codes used when converting a full txt file before saving as .encoded Big-O for encoding a line is O(n) Big-O for a full file is O(n * m) where n is the number of lines and m is the average number of words per line
    Encoder(Map<String, Integer>) - Constructor for class ie.atu.sw.Encoder
    sets the encoding map to use when matching words to numbers

    F

    FileManager - Class in ie.atu.sw
    file manager handles reading and writing text files for the encoder and decoder i use this to get input files and save output so nothing is hardcoded reading is just line by line so its O(n) and writing is same idea
    FileManager() - Constructor for class ie.atu.sw.FileManager
